title: Dafydd Jones (footballer)
text:
Dafydd Rhys Jones (born 5 June 1998) is a Welsh <a href="association%20football">football</a> midfielder.
Career.
Jones was a product of the Newport County academy. He made his senior debut for Newport in the <a href="Football%20League%20Cup">Football League Cup</a> first round match versus <a href="Wolverhampton%20Wanderers%20F.C.">Wolverhampton Wanderers</a> on 11 August 2015 as a second-half substitute. Wolves won the game 2–1. On 31 August 2016, Jones joined <a href="Welsh%20Football%20League%20Division%20One">Welsh Football League Division One</a> club Monmouth Town on loan until 31 January 2017. In December 2016 Newport County confirmed Jones would be released by Newport at the conclusion of his contract on 31 January 2017.
Following his release, Jones joined <a href="Welsh%20Premier%20League">Welsh Premier League</a> side <a href="Aberystwyth%20Town%20F.C.">Aberystwyth Town</a>. but after 5 appearances he re-joined Monmouth Town on a permanent deal.
